mapper.select: SELECT u.id,u.user_name,u.user_pass,u.head_img,r.role_id,r.role_name,p.permission_code,p.path FROM `t_user`u LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN t_role_permission rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN t_permission p ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.user_name = #{userId};

SELECT u.id,u.user_name,u.phone,u.user_pass,u.head_img,r.role_id,r.role_name,p.permission_code,p.path FROM `t_user`u LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN t_role_permission rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN t_permission p ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.phone = #{mobile};
